overview: Sarah's husband owes her a sexy favor. When she spots a hot guy by the pool serving drinks, she figures out how her husband can repay her.  Bridgette's husband wants the work on his house to be finished. Bridgette is so hot, what better form of motivation than to let the contractor fuck her?  Kagney is trying to help Will through his jealousy issues. When she invites him over, she shows him that intimacy can be fun with two people too!  Phoenix Marie invites a trainer over for some yoga lessons. When her husband comes home, she ends up in more sexy positions with the both of them.
title: DP My Wife With Me 5
